title: BEAUTIFUL and SPACIOUS One Bed, One Bath Condo
posting_body: A total steal at only $1,800 per month!

Absolutely stunning condo unit featuring brand new, beautiful custom kitchen with all stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, custom backsplash and modern cabinets Off the kitchen you will find a spacious living/dining area with gleaming wood floors.
Down the hall is one large full bath and your extra large bedroom, complete with custom walk-in closet and quiet balcony overlooking a serene residential setting.
Laundry in building, additional storage in basement.
No pets, no smoking in unit.
Don't wait to schedule your showing - this will go quick!
(owner will restrict tenant access to second bedroom in the unit current used as office/storage)
